video._description: See the evolution of trail. The all new Altra Lone Peak 6

customhtml2_11446045._customHTML: THE ALL-NEW Lone Peak 6

video._description: 360 View of the Altra Lone Peak 6

text._text:
The all-new Lone Peak 6 is here.

Updated and up for anything.

image._alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
FOAM FIT FOR ADVENTURE.

Our Altra EGO™ foam is designed to provide a responsive, yet soft, comfortable feel.

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
GRIPPY TRACTION.
Our grippy Maxtrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.

image._alt: Shot of top portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the customizable lacing system.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
NEW WAYS TO LACE UP.

The Lone Peak 6 is designed for a more secure fit with an updated upper construction and a new customizable lacing system

image._alt: Footshape overlay on man and woman trail running

customhtml2._customHTML:
MOVE NATURALLY.

Our Original FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image._alt: Side-by-side image of Women's and Men's Altra Lone Peak 6

content._jcr:description: The all-new Lone Peak 6 is updated and up for anything. This legendary trail icon is ready to take on any terrain with the features you need for your next run.
content._jcr:title: Lone Peak 6
